SEARCH
Package edu.uiowa.cs.warp

Class ProgramVisualization

java.lang.Object
edu.uiowa.cs.warp.ProgramVisualization
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.uiowa.cs.warp.Visualizable
public class ProgramVisualization extends Object
Builds a visualization of the Warp program. The program is sometimes called a scheduled because it defines the order in which flows transmit their messages through the sensor network. The display graph is created with GraphStream.
Version:
2.0 Fall 2025
Author:
sgoddard

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface edu.uiowa.cs.warp.Visualizable

  • Field Details

    • SOURCE_SUFFIX

      private static final String SOURCE_SUFFIX
      File suffix for the program source file representation (.dsl). This is used to indicate the source format of WARP programs.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • sourceCode

      private edu.uiowa.cs.warp.ProgramSchedule sourceCode
      The program schedule (i.e., table of operations per node and time slot) generated by the WARP system.

    • program

      private edu.uiowa.cs.warp.Program program
      The WARP program being visualized. Contains scheduler information, reliability parameters, channel usage, and fault model details.

    • deadlinesMet

      private Boolean deadlinesMet
      Flag indicating whether all flows in the WARP program meet their specified deadlines.

    • warpOptions

      private edu.uiowa.cs.warp.Options warpOptions
      User-specified options for running WARP (e.g., scheduler choice, visualization settings, verbosity).

    • EMPTY

      protected static final String EMPTY
      Empty string place holder for unretrieved data.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • UNKNOWN

      protected static final String UNKNOWN
      Constant used to validate access to file. If file name is not found or invalid store "UNKNOWN" as a placeholder.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • visualizationData

      protected String[][] visualizationData
      2 dimensional array that stores visualization data.

    • options

      protected edu.uiowa.cs.warp.Options options
      Stores configuration settings used to generate visualization.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProgramVisualization

      ProgramVisualization(edu.uiowa.cs.warp.WarpInterface warp)
      Constructs a ProgramVisualization object for a given WARP system. Initializes the program, schedule, deadline status, and options for visualization.
      Parameters:
      warp - the WARP system instance containing program and workload details

  • Method Details

    • displayVisualization

      protected edu.uiowa.cs.warp.GuiWindow displayVisualization()
      Creates and displays the visualization window for the WARP program. The window includes a title, a column header, and a data table.
      Returns:
      a GuiWindow that displays the program visualization

    • createHeader

      protected edu.uiowa.cs.warp.Description createHeader()
      Creates the header section of the visualization, which provides metadata about the program such as scheduler name, reliability parameters, and number of channels.
      Returns:
      a Description containing header information

    • createFooter

      protected edu.uiowa.cs.warp.Description createFooter()
      Creates the footer section of the visualization, which includes a summary of deadline satisfaction. If deadlines are not met, a warning message is included.
      Returns:
      a Description containing footer information

    • createColumnHeader

      protected String[] createColumnHeader()
      Creates the column header row for the visualization table. The first column represents the time slot, followed by one column for each node in the workload (ordered alphabetically).
      Returns:
      an array of strings representing column names

    • createVisualizationData

      protected String[][] createVisualizationData()
      Builds the visualization data matrix that represents the program schedule. Each row corresponds to a time slot, and each column corresponds to a node. The entries indicate the transmission or operation performed by the node in that time slot.
      Returns:
      a 2D string array representing the schedule visualization data

    • createTitle

      private String createTitle()
      Creates the title string used in both the header and the visualization window. The title includes the program name.
      Returns:
      a formatted string with the program title

    • visualization

      protected edu.uiowa.cs.warp.Description visualization()
      Builds a text-based visualization stored as a Description. This method might enhance the presentation of the core visualization data and even use header helper methods to create a complete text-based visualization.
      Returns:
      the visualization content

    • createFile

      Creates an enhanced GuiWindow visualization in which the top portion is a text representation of the visualization and the bottom portion is a graphical representation using GraphStream.
      Parameters:

      displayTitle - of for the window
      Returns:
